name: api_kit
desc: Simple, fast REST API framework with annotation-based routing.

name: ApiResponse
desc: Standard API response model.

name: ApiResponse.badRequest
desc: Creates a bad request response.

name: ApiResponse.error
desc: Creates an error response.

name: ApiResponse.forbidden
desc: Creates a forbidden response.

name: ApiResponse.fromJson
desc: Creates an ApiResponse from JSON.

name: ApiResponse.notFound
desc: Creates a not found response.

name: ApiResponse.success
desc: Creates a successful response.

name: ApiResponse.unauthorized
desc: Creates an unauthorized response.

name: toJson
desc: Converts the response to JSON.

name: ApiServer
desc:
API server that automatically registers controllers with annotation support.
Now includes JWT validation system integration

name: blacklistToken
desc: Agrega un token a la blacklist (para logout/revocación)

name: blacklistedTokensCount
desc: Obtiene el número de tokens blacklisteados

name: clearTokenBlacklist
desc: Limpia todos los tokens blacklisteados

name: configureJWTAuth
desc:
Configura JWT authentication middleware
Debe llamarse antes de start() para habilitar validación JWT

name: disableJWTAuth
desc: Desactiva JWT authentication

name: removeTokenFromBlacklist
desc: Remueve un token de la blacklist

name: start
desc: Starts the server with automatic controller registration.

name: stop
desc: Stops the server gracefully.

name: BaseController
desc: Base class for all API controllers with common functionality.

name: buildRouter
desc:
Builds and caches the router for this controller asynchronously.
This method supports JWT middleware integration.

name: errorResponse
desc: Creates an error response.

name: getAllQueryParams
desc: Extracts all query parameters as a map.

name: getOptionalHeader
desc: Extracts an optional header from the request.

name: getOptionalParam
desc: Extracts an optional parameter from the request.

name: getOptionalQueryParam
desc: Extracts an optional query parameter from the request.

name: getRequiredHeader
desc: Extracts a required header from the request.

name: getRequiredParam
desc: Extracts a required parameter from the request.

name: getRequiredQueryParam
desc: Extracts a required query parameter from the request.

name: jsonResponse
desc: Creates a JSON response with proper headers.

name: logRequest
desc: Logs request information.

name: router
desc: Returns the router for this controller, built automatically from annotations.

name: BuiltInMiddleware
desc: Built-in middleware creators for common use cases.

name: apiKey
desc: Creates API key authentication middleware.

name: jwt
desc: Creates JWT authentication middleware.

name: rateLimit
desc: Creates endpoint-specific rate limiting middleware.

name: Controller
desc: Annotation to mark a class as an API controller.

name: CorsConfig
desc: CORS configuration.

name: CorsConfig.development
desc: Development CORS configuration (permissive).

name: CorsConfig.production
desc: Default production CORS configuration.

name: DELETE
desc: Annotation for DELETE endpoints.

name: EnhancedAuthMiddleware
desc: Middleware de autenticación JWT mejorado

name: jwtAccessLogger
desc: Middleware para logging de accesos JWT

name: jwtExtractor
desc: Middleware que extrae y valida JWT desde Authorization header

name: tokenBlacklist
desc: Middleware para verificar tokens en blacklist

name: EnhancedReflectionHelper
desc: Sistema de reflexión mejorado para JWT validation

name: createJWTValidationMiddleware
desc: Detecta y procesa anotaciones JWT en controladores y endpoints

name: getControllerMethods
desc: Obtiene la lista de métodos HTTP de un controlador

name: isReflectionAvailable
desc: Verifica si reflection está disponible

name: GET
desc: Annotation for GET endpoints.

name: JWTController
desc: Anotación para validación a nivel de controlador

name: requireAll
desc:
Si es true, TODOS los validadores deben pasar (AND logic)
Si es false, al menos UNO debe pasar (OR logic)

name: validators
desc: Lista de validadores que se ejecutarán

name: JWTControllerConfig
desc: Configuración de validadores a nivel de controlador

name: JWTEndpoint
desc: Anotación para validación a nivel de endpoint específico

name: requireAll
desc:
Si es true, TODOS los validadores deben pasar (AND logic)
Si es false, al menos UNO debe pasar (OR logic)

name: validators
desc: Lista de validadores que se ejecutarán

name: JWTEndpointConfig
desc: Configuración de validadores a nivel de endpoint

name: JWTPublic
desc: Anotación para marcar un endpoint como público (sin validación JWT)

name: JWTValidatorBase
desc: Base abstracta para todos los validadores JWT personalizados.

name: JWTValidatorBase.new
desc: Constructor const para permitir validadores const en anotaciones

name: defaultErrorMessage
desc: Mensaje de error por defecto cuando la validación falla

name: onValidationFailed
desc: Callback opcional ejecutado cuando la validación falla

name: onValidationSuccess
desc: Callback opcional ejecutado cuando la validación es exitosa

name: validate
desc: Método obligatorio que implementa la lógica de validación

name: MiddlewareRegistry
desc: Registry for custom middleware that can be applied to specific endpoints.

name: clear
desc: Clear all registered middleware (mainly for testing).

name: get
desc: Get a registered middleware by name.

name: has
desc: Check if a middleware is registered.

name: names
desc: Get all registered middleware names.

name: register
desc: Register a named middleware that can be referenced in annotations.

name: MyAdminValidator
desc:
Validador para usuarios administradores
Verifica rol, estado activo y permisos de administrador

name: defaultErrorMessage
desc: Mensaje de error por defecto cuando la validación falla

name: onValidationFailed
desc: Callback opcional ejecutado cuando la validación falla

name: onValidationSuccess
desc: Callback opcional ejecutado cuando la validación es exitosa

name: validate
desc: Método obligatorio que implementa la lógica de validación

name: MyBusinessHoursValidator
desc:
Validador para horarios de trabajo
Verifica que el acceso ocurra dentro de horarios permitidos

name: defaultErrorMessage
desc: Mensaje de error por defecto cuando la validación falla

name: onValidationSuccess
desc: Callback opcional ejecutado cuando la validación es exitosa

name: validate
desc: Método obligatorio que implementa la lógica de validación

name: MyDepartmentValidator
desc:
Validador para departamentos específicos
Permite configurar departamentos permitidos y nivel requerido

name: defaultErrorMessage
desc: Mensaje de error por defecto cuando la validación falla

name: onValidationSuccess
desc: Callback opcional ejecutado cuando la validación es exitosa

name: validate
desc: Método obligatorio que implementa la lógica de validación

name: MyFinancialValidator
desc:
Validador para operaciones financieras
Permite configurar requisitos específicos como montos mínimos

name: defaultErrorMessage
desc: Mensaje de error por defecto cuando la validación falla

name: onValidationSuccess
desc: Callback opcional ejecutado cuando la validación es exitosa

name: validate
desc: Método obligatorio que implementa la lógica de validación

name: PATCH
desc: Annotation for PATCH endpoints.

name: POST
desc: Annotation for POST endpoints.

name: PUT
desc: Annotation for PUT endpoints.

name: PathVariable
desc:
Annotation for extracting path variables (Spring Boot style)
Usage: @PathVariable('id') String id

name: RateLimit
desc: Annotation for rate limiting specific endpoints.

name: RateLimitConfig
desc: Rate limiting configuration.

name: RateLimitConfig.development
desc: Development configuration with relaxed limits.

name: RateLimitConfig.production
desc: Default production configuration.

name: RateLimiter
desc: Rate limiter implementation for API protection.

name: create
desc: Creates rate limiting middleware.

name: ReflectionHelper
desc: Spring Boot-style reflection helper for annotation-based routing

name: buildRoutesWithReflection
desc: Build router from controller annotations (Spring Boot style)

name: extractControllerPath
desc: Extract controller path from @Controller annotation

name: isReflectionAvailable
desc: Check if reflection (mirrors) is available

name: RequestBody
desc:
Annotation for extracting request body (Spring Boot style)
Usage: @RequestBody Map<String, dynamic> body

name: RequestHeader
desc:
Annotation for extracting request headers (Spring Boot style)
Usage: @RequestHeader('Authorization') String auth

name: RequestParam
desc:
Annotation for extracting query parameters (Spring Boot style)
Usage: @RequestParam('name') String name

name: RequireAuth
desc: Annotation to require authentication on specific endpoints.

name: RouterBuilder
desc: Builds routes automatically from controller annotations.

name: buildFromController
desc: Builds a router from a controller using annotations when possible.

name: extractControllerPath
desc: Extracts the controller path from @Controller annotation.

name: registerRoute
desc: Helper method to register routes manually when reflection is not available.

name: ServerConfig
desc: Main server configuration.

name: ServerConfig.development
desc: Development server configuration.

name: ServerConfig.production
desc: Production server configuration.

name: SkipMiddleware
desc: Annotation to skip default middleware on specific endpoints.

name: UseMiddleware
desc: Annotation to apply custom middleware to specific endpoints.

name: ValidationResult
desc: Resultado de validación usando Result Pattern

name: invalid
desc: Crea un resultado fallido con mensaje personalizado

name: isFailure
desc: Verifica si la validación falló

name: isSuccess
desc: Verifica si la validación fue exitosa

name: valid
desc: Crea un resultado exitoso

name: corsMiddleware
desc: Creates CORS middleware.

name: errorHandlingMiddleware
desc: Creates error handling middleware.

name: loggingMiddleware
desc: Creates logging middleware.

name: rateLimitMiddleware
desc: Creates rate limiting middleware.

name: requestIdMiddleware
desc: Creates request ID middleware for tracing.

name: requestSizeLimitMiddleware
desc: Creates request size limit middleware.

name: securityHeadersMiddleware
desc: Creates security headers middleware (OWASP protection).
